All Classes and Interfaces

Class
Description
Adm_EventsFragment
Fragment for admin users to view and manage all events.
Adm_ProfilesFragment
Fragment for admin users to view and manage all user profiles.
CreateProfileFragment
Fragment that allows a new user (entrant) to create their profile in the EventLotto app.
Ent_CreateProfileFragment
Fragment that allows entrants to create their user profile in the EventLotto app.
Ent_EventDetailsFragment
 
Ent_FilterFragment
Filter popup for HomeFragment.
Ent_FilterFragment.OnFilterAppliedListener
Listener to send filters back to HomeFragment
Ent_HomeFragment
Displays the entrant's home screen containing a scrollable list of available events.
Ent_MyEventsFragment
Fragment displaying the My Events screen with a list of events, separated into Current Events (events which haven't ended yet) and History (events which have now ended)
Ent_NotificationsFragment
Fragment that displays notifications and followed events for an entrant.
Ent_ScanFragment
 
Ent_WelcomeFragment
Fragment representing the welcome screen for entrant users.
EntryFragment
Fragment responsible for determining whether a user already has a profile or needs to create one.
Event
Represents an event in the application.
EventAdapter
RecyclerView adapter for displaying a list of Event objects.
EventAdapter.OnItemClickListener
Interface definition for a callback to be invoked when an item is clicked.
EventStatus
 
EventStatusTest
 
EventTest
Unit tests for the Event model class.
ExampleInstrumentedTest
Instrumented test, which will execute on an Android device.
FirestoreService
Combined FirestoreService Includes: - User profile CRUD (deviceId-based) - Event invalid input: '&' Notification methods (team version) - Utility helpers

FirestoreServiceTest
Unit tests for FirestoreService (pure JVM + Mockito).
